title: Dark Rain: 15 Short Tales
description: Introducing a short story anthology to remember! Join Samantha Moon, Richelle Dadd, Jack Carter, Nick Caine, and other characters from J.R. Rain's bestselling series, including: - Dark Horse - The Vampire With the Dragon Tattoo - Moon Dance - Elvis Has Not Left the Building - Silent Echo - Temple of the Jaguar - Ghost College - Dragon Assassin - Bound By Blood - Zombie Patrol - Moon Dance - and The Dead Detective as they take you upon spine-tingling adventures full of action, humor, chills, and spills - as only J.R. Rain can.
author: J.R. Rain
